name: Last Index of
description: Search an Array or String to find the index of the last occurrence of a specified item or substring.

arguments.name: Array
arguments.description: The Array or String to search.

arguments.name: Item
arguments.description: The item or substring to search for.

output.description: If the item or substring exists in the Array, the last index of that item is returned. If the item is not found, -1 is returned
